1<?php
2/**
3 * Copyright (C) 1997-2020 Reyesoft <info@reyesoft.com>.
4 *
5 * This file is part of LaravelJsonApi. LaravelJsonApi can not be copied and/or
6 * distributed without the express permission of Reyesoft
7 */
8
9declare(strict_types=1);
10
11namespace Reyesoft\JsonApi\Services;
12
13use Exception;
14use Illuminate\Contracts\Pagination\Paginator;
15use Illuminate\Database\Eloquent\Relations\BelongsTo;
16use Illuminate\Database\Eloquent\Relations\HasOne;
17use Illuminate\Support\Facades\DB;
18use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Validator;
19use Illuminate\Support\Str;
20use Illuminate\Validation\ValidationException;
21use Reyesoft\JsonApi\Core\SchemaProvider;
22use Reyesoft\JsonApi\Eloquent\ObjectsEloquentBuilder;
23use Reyesoft\JsonApi\Eloquent\ObjectsEloquentFiller;
24use Reyesoft\JsonApi\Exceptions\DataValidationException;
25use Reyesoft\JsonApi\Facades\JsonApi;
26
27/**
28 * @property \Reyesoft\JsonApi\Requests\RelatedRequest $jsonapirequest
29 */
30class EloquentDataService extends DataService
31{
32    public function all(): array
33    {
34        $eloquent_builder = $this->action->getSchema()::getResourceInstance()->newQuery();
35
36        return $this->getItemsFromEloquentBuilder($eloquent_builder);
37    }
38
39    public function related(): array
40    {
41        // find parent resource
42        $parent_schema_class = $this->jsonapirequest->getParentSchemaClass();
43        $parent_schema = new $parent_schema_class();
44
45        // set child model
46        $parent_model_class = $parent_schema->getResourceClass();
47        $parent_model = $parent_model_class::findOrFail($this->jsonapirequest->getParentId());
48        $eloquent_builder = $parent_model->{$this->jsonapirequest->getResourceMethodName()}();
49
50        return $this->getItemsFromEloquentBuilder($eloquent_builder);
51    }
52
53    private function getItemsFromEloquentBuilder($eloquent_builder): array
54    {
55        $builder = $this->getObjectBuilder();
56        $builder->setEloquentBuilder($eloquent_builder);
57        $this->action->getSchema()->modelBeforeGet($eloquent_builder);
58        $this->action->callModelPolicyOrFail($builder);
59
60        $paginator = $builder->getObjects();
61        $this->setMetaPage($paginator);
62
63        return $paginator->items();
64    }
65
66    private function getObjectBuilder(): ObjectsEloquentBuilder
67    {
68        return new ObjectsEloquentBuilder(
69            $this->action->getSchema(),
70            $this->action->getSchema()->getModelInstance(),
71            $this->action->getParameters()
72        );
73    }
74
75    protected function setMetaPage(Paginator $paginator): void
76    {
77        $this->meta['page'] = $this->jsonapirequest->getParameters()->getPageNumber();
78        $this->meta['resources_per_page'] = $paginator->perPage();
79        $this->meta['total_resources'] = count($paginator->items())
80            + $paginator->perPage() * ($paginator->currentPage() - 1)
81            + ($paginator->hasMorePages() ? 1 : 0);
82    }
83
84    public static function getRelatedData($relation, $resource, array $includeRelationships, $relation_alias)
85    {
86        $method_name = $relation['method_name'] ?? Str::camel($relation_alias);
87        if ($relation['hasMany'] || isset($includeRelationships[$relation_alias])) {
88            return $resource->{$method_name};
89        }
90
91        // unnecessary eloquent request
92        $modelFieldId = self::getModelFieldId($resource, $method_name);
93        if ($modelFieldId === null) {
94            return;
95        }
96
97        $modelClass = $relation['schema']::$model;
98        // if $modelClass is empty, related schema don't work with Eloquent (or is an old implementation)
99        if (!empty($resource->{$modelFieldId}) && !empty($modelClass)) {
100            $relation = new $modelClass();
101            $relation->id = $resource->{$modelFieldId};
102
103            return $relation;
104        }
105
106        $related_data = $resource->{$method_name};
107
108        // debug purposes
109        if ($related_data === null && !method_exists($resource, $method_name)) {
110            throw new Exception('Method "' . $method_name . '" dont exists on ' . $relation['schema']::$model . ' model.' . ' We are trying to build ' . $relation_alias . ' alias.');
111        }
112
113        return $related_data;
114    }
115
116    private static function getModelFieldId($resource, $method_name): ?string
117    {
118        $model_relation = $resource->{$method_name}();
119        if ($model_relation instanceof BelongsTo) {
120            // dont add ->getRelated(). Example:
121            // - method: author()
122            // -- $resource->{$method_name}()->getForeignKey(): 'author_id'
123            // -- $resource->{$method_name}()->getRelated()->getForeignKey(): 'user_id'
124            // - method: seller()
125            // -- $resource->{$method_name}()->getForeignKey(): 'seller_id'
126            // -- $resource->{$method_name}()->getRelated()->getForeignKey(): 'entity_id'
127            // getForeignKey is replaced by getForeignKeyName on laravel 5.8
128            $modelFieldId = $model_relation->getForeignKeyName();
129
130            // @todo Config will be required.
131            // This considers a model attribute_id=0 like a empty belongs to
132            if ($resource->{$modelFieldId} === '0' || $resource->{$modelFieldId} === null) {
133                return null;
134            }
135
136            return $modelFieldId;
137        }
138        if ($model_relation instanceof HasOne) {
139            return $method_name . '_id';
140        }
141
142        return $method_name . '_id';
143    }
144
145    public function get(string $id = null): \ArrayAccess
146    {
147        $builder = $this->getObjectBuilder();
148        $this->action->getSchema()->modelBeforeGet($builder->getEloquentBuilder());
149        $this->action->callModelPolicyOrFail($builder->getEloquentBuilder());
150
151        return $builder->getObject($id ?? $this->action->getId());
152    }
153
154    public function create(): \ArrayAccess
155    {
156        $schema = $this->action->getSchema();
157        $object = $schema->getModelInstance();
158        $schema->modelBeforeSave($object);
159        $this->checkRulesOrFail($schema, $this->action->getData());
160        $this->fillAndSaveObject($object, $this->action->getData());
161
162        return $this->getObjectBuilder()->getObject((string) $object->id);
163    }
164
165    public function update(string $id = null): \ArrayAccess
166    {
167        $schema = $this->action->getSchema();
168        $builder = $this->getObjectBuilder();
169
170        $restore = $this->action->getData()['meta']['restore'] ?? false;
171        if ($restore === true && $schema::$canBeRestored === true) {
172            // recover soft deleted element
173            $object = $builder->getTrashedObject($id ?? $this->action->getId());
174        } else {
175            $this->action->getSchema()->modelBeforeGet($builder->getEloquentBuilder());
176            $object = $builder->getObject($id ?? $this->action->getId());
177        }
178
179        $schema->modelBeforeSave($object);
180
181        if ($restore === true) {
182            // recover soft deleted element
183            $this->action->callModelPolicyOrFail($object);
184            $fc = 'restore';    // phpstan problem. this model has SoftDeletes trait
185            $object->{$fc}();
186        } else {
187            $this->checkRulesOrFail($schema, $this->action->getData());
188            $this->fillAndSaveObject($object, $this->action->getData());
189        }
190
191        return $this->getObjectBuilder()->getObject((string) $object->getKey());
192    }
193
194    public function delete(string $id = null): bool
195    {
196        $schema = $this->action->getSchema();
197        $builder = $this->getObjectBuilder();
198        $this->action->getSchema()->modelBeforeGet($builder->getEloquentBuilder());
199        $object = $builder->getObject($id ?? $this->action->getId());
200        $schema->modelBeforeSave($object);
201        $this->action->callModelPolicyOrFail($object);
202
203        return $object->delete() !== false;
204    }
205
206    private function fillAndSaveObject($object, array $data): bool
207    {
208        $filler = new ObjectsEloquentFiller($object, $this->action);
209
210        return $filler->fillAndSave($data);
211    }
212
213    private function checkRulesOrFail(SchemaProvider $schema, array $data): bool
214    {
215        $rules = [];
216        foreach ($schema->getAttributesSchema() as $name => $attribute) {
217            if (!isset($attribute['rules'])) {
218                continue;
219            }
220
221            $rules[$name] = $attribute['rules'];
222        }
223
224        try {
225            $validator = Validator::make(
226                $data['data']['attributes'],
227                $rules
228            );
229            $validator->validate();
230        } catch (ValidationException $e) {
231            throw DataValidationException::fromErrorArray($e->errors());
232        }
233
234        return true;
235    }
236
237    public function openTransaction(): void
238    {
239        JsonApi::eloquentHelper()->beginTransaction();
240    }
241
242    public function closeTransaction(): void
243    {
244        JsonApi::eloquentHelper()->commitTransaction();
245    }
246
247    public function rollbackTransaction(): void
248    {
249        JsonApi::eloquentHelper()->rollbackTransaction();
250    }
251}
